name: lyrics_get
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool songmeanings.
Tool description: Easily follow and track your favorite artists on SongMeanings!
Be the first to know about new lyrics, song meanings & more!
API description: Fetches lyrics and related data for a specific song using the SongMeanings API.

sm_lid.description: SongMeanings Lyric ID. When specified, this parameter will bypass any other lyric identification parameters.

lyric_title.description: The title of the song or track.

format.description: Decide the output type (either xml or json); xml is default.

spotify_id.description: The Spotify ID of the song. If specified, a match will attempt to be made via this ID. The API will also require `lyric_title` and `artist_name` as backup attempts if this parameter is used. Defaults to None.

count.description: This parameter is used to track, and report, any offline cached views of lyrics.
